channel.title: Xp help
channel.description:
hello ill have a server LOL. but i gonna slow up how to make it higher that i go faster? byee
edit: okay if u dont understand me check this ill see in some servers is u hit 1 time than u go 5lvls up or something but i need to hit 20 times to go a lvl up. but how to set it faster. that if i hit i get 5 lvls up ill hope u understand me

item.title: Xp help
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“bankotsu11, post:8, topic:309351”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=405790.msg3026893#msg3026893 date=1257991378]

hey dude im happy i came to this cause i can help you out. its very simple. i recommend getting xp slower it brings in more people and is more poplular. to change it search in client.java in ur source then do ctrl+f then type rate
keep clicking enter till u find somthing like this:

    	double TotalExp = 0;                                                                                                 
      if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {                                                        
        TotalExp = (double)(200*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
      } else if (FightType != 3) {

dont copy and paste that but see were it says 200. thats how much xp u get ea hit. i do 75 now cause i hate fast lvling. My updated one would be like double TotalExp = 0; if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(75*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) {

keep searching in client.java till u dont see that any more. hope it helped dude

Idiot, look at when this was posted.

/facepalm
[/quote]

oh man a month ago… thats not really a face palm you retard… if it was like over 3/4 months, then yeah it would probly be necessary. and as you can see, a question came up AFTER it was posted, so basically you could keep it open to help the kid. so yeah

/facepalm
to you[/quote]

facepalm to me? This topic was since october, whoever posted this would find out how to change it by then.

So really i just dodged your face palm and hit you with a face palm, but you cant dodge mine only i can dodge yours

Read full topic
